Section.Catchline: Readoption by ordinance of plan amendments adopted pursuant to former s. 163.32465, subject to local referendum.

SectionBody.Text: A comprehensive plan amendment adopted pursuant to s. 163.32465 subject to voter referendum by local charter, and found in compliance before June 2, 2011, may be readopted by ordinance, shall become effective upon approval by the local government, and is not subject to review or challenge pursuant to the provisions of s. 163.32465 or s. 163.3184.
